name: Restaurant Style Egg Custard Pie
author: STEPHIKIN
summary: Excellent Egg Custard Pie recipe that I've worked at forever to duplicate a popular restaurant's pie! I finally got it!
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C
) In a large bowl, combine eggs, sugar, salt and vanilla
Mix just enough to incorporate all the ingredients
In a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, combine milk and butter
Use a wire whisk and stir constantly until the milk begins to rise in the saucepan at a rapid boil - 5 to 8 minutes
NEVER stop stirring, or the milk will burn
Pour the hot mixture into the egg mixture, stirring as you pour
Line a 9 inch pan with dough
Protect the edges of crust with a ring of aluminum foil
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes
Remove foil and bake for 8 to 10 minutes
